Inventos Digitais

September 2016 - February 2017

Overview

Inventos Digitais is a product design and software engineering consultancy that help tech companies to kick-off. I led the user interface design and implementation for one of their clients.

Role

User Interface Design
User Experience Research
Project Management

Team

1 Product Designer
1 Front-End Engineer
1 Back-End Engineer

Loan Management (Admin)

Web

Situation

Our team was responsible for design and implementation of the features provided by the client, that acted as the Product Owner for this project.

The product translated the initial customer acquisition and credit analysis process into a tracking-like user interface.
